lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It could coincide with the June Venice summit of leaders of the seven major industrial democracies -- the United States, Japan, West Germany, Britain, France, Italy and Canada.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Until very recently, the current administration has urged a lower dollar to help redress its huge trade deficit while Carter faced a weak dollar as confidence in his economic policies collapsed.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Carter issued 6.4 billion dlrs of mark and swiss franc bonds aimed essentially at buttressing pyschological support for the dollar but also at attracting foreign investors, who had lost confidence in the dollar, to U.
